TikTok automatically adds watermarks when content is downloaded. Shouldn't be too difficult to do something similar. Or better yet, embed a creator tag in the metadata of the file that can be tracked for monetization and identify accounts that habitually steal other content.

That doesn't bypass screen recorders, but it could definitely help.

So what are the ways to monetize X?

In one article on this topic, the author divided monetization in X into two types:
hard - which is very difficult to achieve,
and easy - which I chose.

What is included in easy monetization:

distribution of a referral link: airdrops, prediction markets, etc.

sale of advertising

ambassadors, roles

and much more

For myself, I chose to distribute my referral link and trade on @Polymarket.

But to successfully trade on Polymarket, you need to choose a tool that will help with this.

For me, such a tool was the @Chance_ platform

Chance is the only platform that collects markets from different prediction markets into one clear and comparable presentation.

Here, users can track not only prices, liquidity and volumes, but also follow top traders and study their strategies.

On the main page, you can choose a prediction market.

For myself, I chose Polymarket.

üîó Market:
https://t.co/ZwxF8C6yba

I am impressed by the opportunity to buy shares here on the fact that the price of silver by 01/31/2026 will be $ 110, at a price of 44 cents.

Considering that silver is currently trading at $ 103 per ounce, I believe that this is quite possible.

Yesterday this probability was 18%, and today it is already 44%.

Whoever bought these shares yesterday has already received almost 2X profit.

Selling digital products is simple in theory but difficult in execution.
What people call ‚Äúeasy‚Äù is usually the result of:

-Months of unpaid work

-Repeated failed launches

- Audience building before monetization

-skill stacking (content, systems, psychology)
#digitalproducts
